title: @Riot How is this allowed and not perma banned.
body: I had to edit out the names I'm assuming.  But how is this language not banned immediately?  It's flat out racist and toxic but this text from a game with a duo q who spammed and was toxic all game so I'm sure this isn't their first offense.

replies.body: Imgur has a built in editor with the blemish tool. Try it sometime

> [{quoted}](name=Bôôsted Bonobo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AbQhtwAq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-29T06:45:00.271+0000)
>
> It's not. Report them.

I did, but I still haven't received the little notification saying the player has been punished.
Literally only one of those messages gets sent per punishment. So like, if you reported them and then someone loads in after you and reports them, that other person will get the message.
Itll only tell you if you were the last person to report them

You only get that if/when they get punished by the system and it was your report that did it.

I had one notification pop up randomly days after my last report on someone right in champion select, so. ANything is possible.
